H0.text: Which corporation (as at 2010) produces Schwarzkopf haircare and Pritt glue-stick products. Unilever

H1.text: Which corporation (as at 2010) produces Schwarzkopf haircare and Pritt glue-stick products. Procter & Gamble

H2.text: Which corporation (as at 2010) produces Schwarzkopf haircare and Pritt glue-stick products. L'Or√©al

H3.text: Which corporation (as at 2010) produces Schwarzkopf haircare and Pritt glue-stick products. Henkel

A4.text: Henkel's hair and body care brands include Schwarzkopf, Dial, and Syoss.

A5.text: Pritt, the world's first glue stick, made its debut in 1969. Over the years, other products were introduced under this brand, underlining Henkel's importance in the office and stationery supplies sector.
